snippet: Though the playoffs appeared to be within reach, the team languished below .500 under Maurice Cheeks’s brief leadership.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Detroit Pistons fire coach Maurice Cheeks after less than a year on the job, with the Pistons languishing well below .500 despite off-season moves aimed at putting the struggling franchise back in contention; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Though the playoffs appeared to be within reach, the team languished below .500 under Maurice Cheeks’s brief leadership.
